title: iF DESIGN AWARD 2024 winner series: teague visit and interview
description: from the long-haul passenger rail in the U.S., to life on the moon, teague tells designboom all there is to know behind their two iF DESIGN AWARD 2024 wins. The post iF DESIGN AWARD 2024 winner series: teague visit and interview appeared first on designboom | architecture & design magazine.
author: eirini ilia I designboom
excerpt: designboom celebration of iF DESIGN AWARD 2024 winners continues with teague, where we explore everything behind roam rail and lunar habitat.
text: Nick Ross, Principal Industrial Designer at Teague (left), and Sushant Vohra, Senior Industrial Designer at Teague (right), spoke to designboom as part of a studio visit interview series to celebrate iF DESIGN AWARD 2024 winnersKEEP UP WITH OUR DAILY AND WEEKLY NEWSLETTERS PRODUCT LIBRARYa diverse digital database that acts as a valuable guide in gaining insight and information about a product directly from the manufacturer, and serves as a rich reference point in developing a project or scheme.
html:
Nick Ross, Principal Industrial Designer at Teague (left), and Sushant Vohra, Senior Industrial Designer at Teague (right), spoke to designboom as part of a studio visit interview series to celebrate iF DESIGN AWARD 2024 winners

PRODUCT LIBRARY

a diverse digital database that acts as a valuable guide in gaining insight and information about a product directly from the manufacturer, and serves as a rich reference point in developing a project or scheme.
